alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Limestone and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Pulaski, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Elkmont, Lester, Holland Gin, Leggtown, Blanche and Cash Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
